404.text: Your personalized race report is ready to create, but we've received an error. Please try again.

landing_page.title: Boom Boom Say..
landing_page.subtitle: Sign in to see your accomplishment in film
landing_page.disclaimer: This summary of your race on Strava will include data from public and private activities that you uploaded in the last 16 weeks.
landing_page.privacy_policy: Please read our privacy policy for more information.

landing_page_logged_out.title: Your Race Report
landing_page_logged_out.body: Your personalized race report is ready to create, but we need make sure it's you before showing your stats. Check your email for a link to log in and watch your film.
